member.name: M:TransactionService.TransactionService.RentMovies(System.Collections.Generic.List{MovieRental.DataModel.Connect.MovieRentalTransaction})
member.summary: Use this API for processing multiple transactions that are added to cart
member.param: MovieRentalTransaction model that has movie Id, payment details ( payment type like CC, cash and the card details)
member.returns: List of MovieTransactionResult that has transactionId ,movieId , processedon( when the transaction is processed) and status of the call
